name: WpWebSol Disable Right Click
author: WpWebSol

sections.description: WpWebSol Disable Right Click a very simple and light weight plugin that is specialy design to prevent users from copy text, view source and inspect elements by right clicking.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire “wpws-disable-right-click” zip file through Plugins > Add New > Uplaod Plugin .
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins > Installed Plugins.

For Step by Step demonstrations with screenshots.
Please Visit https://wpwebsol.com/plugins/disable-right-click/
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with this plugin?
E-Mail Us : admin@wpwebsol.com
